bibl.title: Polish Archaeology in the Mediterranean. X. Reports 1998.
bibl.note: Rapports d'activités en Égypte (Alexandrie, Marina el-Alamein, Tell el-Farkha, Tell Atrib, Le Caire, Saqqara, Naqlun, Deir el-Bahari, oasis de Dakhleh), au Soudan, à Chypre, au Liban et en Syrie.
Polish Archaeology in the Mediterranean. X. Reports 1998.
Warsaw, University of Warsaw, Polish Centre of Mediterranean Archaeology, 1999, 8°, 217 pp., figg., plans.
